description.en:
The BOS platform project was started in late 2016, and has undergone a major change in technical governance and direction in early 2018. From 2019, We intend to set our course to the original white paperat the time of the ICO with a new brand name called BOSAGORA.

BOSAGORA came from the word ‚ÄúBOS‚Äù and ‚ÄúAGORA‚Äù combined together, which shows the true birth of democracy.

BOSAGORA aims toward more democratic and productive decision-making process with a blockchain implementation.

status_updates.description:
[#Say_ehello Campaign]
We can't just sit down behind COVID-19,
let's say ehello to your family, friends, and each other!

Post: https://bit.ly/2V2LPOj
Instagram: https://bit.ly/2xno0I0
Reddit: https://bit.ly/2xoJe8v

#say_ehello #coronavirus #COVID19 #QuarantineActivities #boa

More development updates!

Dev. Sprint 14 Update: https://bit.ly/3aZ25FW

Here is the Monthly Report for Mar. that we have been hard at last month!

Monthly Report Mar. 2020: https://bit.ly/2UTgptV

To comfort you all suffering from Covid-19, please just take a few moment to relax out of this mess by sharing fun yet heartwarming memes.

Join us here: https://t.me/bpf_eng

#crypto #cryptocurrency #blockchain #COVID1 #coronavirus #CheerUp #MEMES

JOIN OUR TWITTER : https://twitter.com/BOSAGORA1/status/1245155686310244353?s=20

Dev. team update from Sprint 13!

https://bit.ly/3boc1IB
